resources.string: Canberra is the capital of Australia. \n哥伦比亚是澳大利亚的首都
The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean. \n太平洋比大西洋大
The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean. \n苏伊士运河连接着红海和印度洋
The source of the Nile River is in Egypt. \n尼罗河的起源在埃及
The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas. \n亚马逊河是美洲最长的河流
Lake Baikal is the world\'s oldest and deepest freshwater lake. \n贝加尔湖是世界上最老最深的湖
